original_text: Today I will begin to make all the people in the world afraid of you. They will hear reports about you. That will cause them to be very frightened. They will shake with fear!’
korean_text: 오늘부터 내가 천하 만민이 너를 무서워하며 너를 두려워하게 하리니 그들이 네 명성을 듣고 떨며 너로 말미암아 근심하리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: to make all the people in the world afraid of you
sentences.korean_translation: 세상의 모든 백성으로 하여금 너를 두려워하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: They will hear reports about you
That will cause them to be very frightened
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 그들을 크게 두렵게 할 것이며
